author: Napier Lopez
title: Facebook built a map that tracks COVID-19 symptoms by county
description: Mark Zuckerberg today revealed Facebook has teamed up with Carnegie Mellon University to help track the spread of potential COVID-19 cases around the world – even situations where there hasn’t been an explicit diagnosis. The company today revealed an interact…
content:
Mark Zuckerberg today revealed Facebook has teamed up with Carnegie Mellon University to help track the spread of potential COVID-19 cases around the world even situations where there hasnt been an explicit diagnosis.
